I have a love-hate relationship with this one. Idk but I bought it, felt underwhelmed and had to return it then I bought it again and there are days I love it and now I barely touch it. Maybe Ill have to figure out when the best time to wear this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1903461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1903461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1902139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1808838">BreakfastCerealBath</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-13">08/13/23 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Weird relationship with this fragrance. Initially I smelled the inside of the cap, and it was a beautiful, shimmering, warm musk. <br />
<br />
With this great first impression, I was curious to know how it reacted with my skin and scent- I immediately regretted it as it was outrageously latex-y, combined with the musk it reminded me of condoms and a strong desire to shower.<br />
<br />
It later settled into the original fragrance and complimented my skin. Whilst beautiful, it doesnt make up for the initial application.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1901372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1901372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1884614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The smell of vanilla the powdery scent the green apple lily jasmine it's all there.  Very feminine, very enticing and absolutely aphrodisiac of a fragrance.<br />
Only on very rare occasions has a scent been found to be absolutely fantastic and mind-blowing by me, and Artemesia was one of them. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1795992" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1795992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1795992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-29">03/29/23 22:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would believe you if you told me this is how the gates of heaven smelled like Truly angelic, white floral with a powdery vanilla moss finish. I for some reason correspond this with this soviet fairytale enchanted princess named Vasilisa the Beautiful. Full of elegance, kindness, grace and beauty. If you need for a more recent reference- this smells how Inika's solo voice sounds like singing Jericho. I am probably going to invest in a full bottle because it's such a fitting fragrance that I would love to be one of my signatures Sillage is intimate and longevity is more 4-6 hours<br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Libra Pisces Aquarius</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1795992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1795992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not a fan</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1788777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1788777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1777638" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dont blind buy if you are searching for powdery scent. The Favourite would fit the bill better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1777638"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1777638#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1764269" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1764269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Herwitchinesss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611971"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611971.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Herwitchinesss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Vanilla-Royale-Sugared-Patchouli-64-Eau-De-Parfum-Intense-77430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 Eau De Parfum Intense"title="Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli | 64 Eau De Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1764269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1764269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611971">Herwitchinesss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-19">02/19/23 20:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lovely powdery violet scent that I find quite hard to describe as there is a note to it that makes me feel quiet nostalgia, a bittersweet longing entering in my mind the longer I attempt to focus on what it is I'm smelling. <br />
<br />
It is a comforting scent despite that disquiet I feel; as the reviewer below mine said, it really does feel like a warm hug though I'm not sure why it feels that way to me. Perhaps this is the scent my late brother in law wore - the kit was originally his but given to me after he passed before he had time to use more than one vial up, or perhaps there's just simply a note of my childhood buried in the formula for it. In either case, I'll definitely be buying at least a large decant of it if not a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1764269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1764269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1674416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1674416" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Darling of Disquiet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1552330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Darling of Disquiet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Musc-Noir-Rose-For-Her-71596.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71596.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musc Noir Rose For Her"title="Musc Noir Rose For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1674416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1674416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552330">Darling of Disquiet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-26">10/26/22 03:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I took quite awhile with this girl and I'm glad I did because it has become one of my favorite comfy fragrances. It's not something that I would wear to go out and it's definitely a fragrance that I wear for myself and goodness gracious I absolutely love the scents that I wear 100% for me myself and I. This is a fragrance that I like to spray once or twice on my scarf and take a walk in the snow with my girls. IDK what about it makes it super super comforting to me but it's like a nice warm hug for me. I think in the last 7 months of having it it has started to be a comfy time for bed scent for my girls also. Which is something I truly love because I am a huge fan of keeping a little bit of my mother's favorite perfumes that she wore when I was growing up on hand just so that when I want to smell her I always can and hopefully I'm making great olfactory memories for my girls.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1674416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1674416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1672535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1672535" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mistress Eva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/38584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.38584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mistress Eva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Sous-Le-Pont-Mirabeau-80360.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80360.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sous Le Pont Mirabeau"title="Sous Le Pont Mirabeau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1672535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1672535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/38584">Mistress Eva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-23">10/23/22 12:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My review is for a bottle I bottle in 2014. <br />
<br />
Violet and light musk are by far the most dominant notes, with detectable unsweetened vanilla and lily-of-the-valley. A bit of nectarine emerges as it dries down. This is a great hot weather, spring, or early fall scent. It is utterly inoffensive, but not boring. I dont find it sexy or sensual, and it doesnt need to be. Artemisia is a refined, office-appropriate scent that can be dressed down if needed. A solid like for me!<br />
<br />
Feminine. The projection is intimate to arms-length. The longevity is moderate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1672535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1672535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1668528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Thank goodness it was a 2ml from gift set, I would not be happy if I had paid for this. I used the whole 2ml and cant even smell it on my clothing/sleeve! I am a fan of Penhaligons but this is really disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1668528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1668528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1655924" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1655924" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bebeck"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1425868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bebeck" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Sweet-Oriental-Dream-3768.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3768.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Oriental Dream"title="Sweet Oriental Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1655924ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1655924" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425868">Bebeck</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-30">09/30/22 03:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely a "clean" scent but smells like my granny. I haven't smelt my granny for nearly 20 years because she's dead but she smelt like this. Headachey and fuddy duddy. Smells like soap, powder and musk. I get no nectarine, vanilla or apple. Outdated. Not a young fragrance imo. I pick up on the white flowers but all together it's a little sickening. <br />
May be nice on an older lady but not youthful. And as I'm pretty sure my granny didn't wear Penhaligons, it has been done before.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1655924"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1655924#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1636792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1636792" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LenoreHolly"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LenoreHolly" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1636792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1636792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555201">LenoreHolly</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-02">09/02/22 15:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A review for a niche audience, perhaps, but if youve smelled the head of a Miniland doll, youve smelled Ellenisia.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; the dry down is basically pure baby powder....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1587153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1587153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1567983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1567983" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dismalharmony"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330942"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330942.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dismalharmony" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Avon/Far-Away-4908.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4908.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Far Away"title="Far Away"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1567983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1567983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330942">dismalharmony</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-20">05/20/22 17:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Uh, did I just put water on my wrists? Im not exaggerating when I say that I smell almost nothing. It fades from artificial cherry to a virtually undetectable sweet musk in the space of 5 minutes. Sticks around for a couple of hours, tops, though youd have to keep burying your nose in your wrist to ascertain this. I cant even say that it has no redeeming qualities, because that would imply that it has any qualities at all. It isnt quiet its silent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1567983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1567983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554911" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ldg89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ldg89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Inimitable-William-Penhaligon-63969.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63969.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Inimitable William Penhaligon"title="The Inimitable William Penhaligon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554911ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554911" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496161">ldg89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-01">05/01/22 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Alright I will try to summarise it for those ones who are particularly into life experiences. When I was a little girl, I remember distinctly what it felt like when you smell your new dolls hair and skin. Now after that plastic (which I personally like and find absolutely unique) comes a soft baby powder which keeps you warm. The amber is quite light and breathy so this perfume wont choke you in summer. People normally feel very comfortable around it. <br />
For me its one of the new favourites, particularly because its a childhood smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1554911"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1554911#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1545759" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Like hospital gloves, or a latex suit. Ive tried it on multiple occasions and the dry down smells like powdering of a latex suit. While Im not opposed to it, it isnt what I want to smell like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1545759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1545759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531761" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531761" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yes Malena"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1380154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1380154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yes Malena" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531761ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531761" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); I like it. I would like to wear this in Spring. I will not buy it because of the price. Beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1531761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1531761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1519933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1519933" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ksj_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ksj_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-pour-Homme-52.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"title="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1519933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1519933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640">Ksj_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-09">03/09/22 17:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful fragrance.<br />
<br />
It has a uniqueness at its core, surrounded by familiarity. I think this may be full bottle worthy and is definitely worth sampling. Also, I can't see people not appreciating this fragrance when you wear it.<br />
<br />
I look forward to wearing it the next time I wish to enjoy my own company.<br />
<br />
<br />
 8/10 and completely unisex</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1519933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1519933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1500077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1500077" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cheviota"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cheviota" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Intense-Cafe-18021.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18021.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Intense Cafe"title="Intense Cafe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1500077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1500077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379462">cheviota</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-08">02/08/22 07:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was excited to try Artemisia due to the rave reviews, but this smells exactly like plastic to me. I sense absolutely no sweetness that the notes suggest. No florals, no vanilla, just straight up plastic that's been doused in hairspray. I agree with @Konga5000 that it reminds me of the smell of a high-end salon: artificial and musky. Definitely not blind buy safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1500077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1500077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1499370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1499370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jaclyncxh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1314803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jaclyncxh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artemisia"title="Artemisia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1499370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1499370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314803">jaclyncxh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-07">02/07/22 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is an emotion. It is powdery, slightly sweet, clean fresh linen, a soft musky milky scent of a child or a puppy. Soft and fluffy. Perhaps there is this slightly synthetic note but in fact it makes the scent more complex, like the smell of dolls or play dough, it's quite addictive, interesting as iris is not listed as a note. I associate this with comfort, a kind, feminine experience of love. The scent of a mother, sister. Good for all seasons and preferably day time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1499370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1499370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1495808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1495808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="necrocrunk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451439"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1451439.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="necrocrunk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alkemia-Perfumes/Caveau-des-Innocents-39101.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39101.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caveau des Innocents"title="Caveau des Innocents"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1495808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1495808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451439">necrocrunk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-01">02/01/22 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I invested in two samples from Penhaligon's out of curiosity- a feminine and masculine scent- and I was worried about this one. After I purchased it I decided to peruse the reviews and notes and seeing powdery made me nervous. I absolutely HATE powdery scents as I grew up around my grandma wearing only the powder Avon perfumes. Never again, I've vowed. But this... this is quite nice! The powdery scent keeps seeming like it's going to show up though it never does- I can definitely detect the 'caramel' opening notes though it leans more sweets than a warm caramel. And then, as it dries down, it becomes a nice, sweet and vanilla floral. It constantly edges on powdery while saying refined and light. It feels almost faery-like in quality. It's quite a nice scent. I don't know if I'd wear it save for special occasions, but it is very nice and I recommend a sample first! <br />
<br />
My only gripe? this perfume has quite poor longevity. I put on a few today when I woke up to test longevity and this was the only one I couldn't smell after around 7 hours of wear. It's not very strong in general, so keep that in mind when buying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1495808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1495808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1495615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1495615" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fiaooo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fiaooo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bottega-Veneta/Parco-Palladiano-III-Pera-38265.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38265.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Parco Palladiano III: Pera"title="Parco Palladiano III: Pera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1495615ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1495615" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416730">Fiaooo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-01">02/01/22 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this from a fragrance swap today and I'm absolutely in love. It's a soft, comforting powdery scent . Lightly floral with some tea in the background. Can't seem to get enough of it! <br />
I thought I was reminded of iris but it doesn't seem to be one of the notes. <br />
My only issue would be that while it lasts really long (I can still smell it after 6+ hours), sillage is super poor. More or less a skin scent for me, I can smell it only when my hands are close to my face, or if I deliberately sniff at my wrists. Really wish the performance was better especially since Penhaligon's ain't cheap.<br />
Nevertheless, I'm tempted to get a full bottle of my own!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1495615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1495615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1483538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1474747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1474747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1442916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1442916" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ravenna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360311"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360311.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ravenna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1442916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1442916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360311">ravenna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-09">11/09/21 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I definitely get the nectarine and violet. I dont find it too powdery on my skin, but it smells vintage and VERY feminine. Some people seem to find nectarine synthetic/plasticky (like in JM Nectarine Blossom &amp; Honey) but on my skin it just smells fruity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1442916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1442916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1425612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1425612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monicaaooo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321910.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monicaaooo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1425612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1425612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321910">monicaaooo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-10">10/10/21 05:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very light and airy scent. I like how nm99 put it, it's "dainty." It wasn't love at first sniff for me because I could barely smell it on paper. But after several wears, I've become smitten. It smells of soft powdery vanilla. The nectarine smells more like a light peach to me and I can detect the musk and violet. I find it best to spray it on right after a shower. I'd say this is a gentle morning scent. Like you're still cozy in your bed, the alarm is just about to go off but the sun is shining lightly through the open window.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1425612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1425612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1418244" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1418244" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nm999"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394514"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1394514.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nm999" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1418244ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1418244" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); It has a whimsical quality to it. On my skin, I smell mostly vanilla and a little violet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1418244"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1418244#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1409802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1409802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Danae27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1278989"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1278989.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Danae27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Fame-74962.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74962.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fame"title="Fame"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1409802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1409802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1278989">Danae27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-13">09/13/21 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received this as a sample from a very generous member on here and it was an instant love. Powdery, musky and slightly sweet with a good dose of iris and violet. I feel very sophisticated when I wear this but this is also cosy enough to wear as a bedtime scent. I watched a YouTube reviewer say it was the scent of a ballerina and I completely agree.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1409802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1409802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1404669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1404669" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pweedyadel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1159472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pweedyadel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/La-Belle-55786.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55786.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Belle"title="La Belle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1404669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1404669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159472">pweedyadel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-05">09/05/21 00:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My initial reaction to this is wow this smells nice but its similar to DKNY Cashmere Mist which I have in my collection but Artemisia is less musky (powdery) than the DKNY. Its a little sweet, perfectly powdery, perfectly musky and perfectly floral. <br />
I will dress Lady Diane with this scent. Its for those well groomed ladies who are feminine, sophisticated, luxe and classy in every word. Its a beautiful calm cozy scent in my opinion. Worth a purchase </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1404669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1404669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1399856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1399856" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfume_obsessed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfume_obsessed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1399856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1399856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); Of the three though I think this is closest to Sicily as its a bit sweeter and warmer than Guilette, which is a bit fresher and more crisp.  All three of them dry down to a beautiful soft soapy scent that is so comforting.  Im going to need a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1399856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1399856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1395315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells almost brown sugary in the opening, that I think is the nectarine.  A little sweet, a little floral (mainly violets), a little green, with vanilla, green tea, and oakmoss. Smells almost like a powdery sweet tea...with vanilla. It's a little strange... but also unique. I'm not sure I would ever wear this again, but it was fun to try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1395315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1395315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1388894" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
