One of my favourites!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1354845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1354845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1341695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1341695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ewi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ewi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Femme-Individuelle-843.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.843.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Femme Individuelle"title="Femme Individuelle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1341695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1341695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226004">Ewi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-11">05/11/21 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, soft relaxing scent. Cannot stop wearing it, the only downside is that longevity is not the greatest 4-5 hours but I reapply. It is calming and a bit motherly to me. At the beginning a bit stronger on musk and then beautiful blend of violet and vanilla in the heart and dry down. Love </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1341695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1341695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1337795" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1337795" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sallyming"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282971"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sallyming" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Anna-Sui/Fantasia-Mermaid-54060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fantasia Mermaid"title="Fantasia Mermaid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1337795ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1337795" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282971">sallyming</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-05">05/05/21 06:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have not smelled Versace Baby Rose Jeans but Artemisia reminded me of Red Jeans' dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1337795"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1337795#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1334964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1334964" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jessica_Jones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jessica_Jones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche"title="Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1334964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1334964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250089">Jessica_Jones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-30">04/30/21 07:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Artemisia vs Cashmere Mist EDP:<br />
First impression, they smell similar.<br />
But side by side, the comparison contrasts their notes; CM smells like straight up white musk and vanilla, maybe some florals, warm and nice. Artemisia smells more complex, medicinal, green, with some honey note (my boyfriend said it reminds him of Le Male? lol). <br />
CM wins for me considering it's more pleasant and the price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1334964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1334964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1329183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1329183" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CurrencyThat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310604"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1310604.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CurrencyThat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1329183ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1329183" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310604">CurrencyThat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-20">04/20/21 23:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A dainty powdery cloud of vanilla. Clean and fresh and evoking of coziness. It's a comforting scent that keeps me sniffing my wrists for more. Powder, powder, powder all the way and a difficult scent to dislike. I want to wear this everywhere for the sheer comfort it evokes. Oddly, I struggle to say it's office-appropriate since it's snuggly and cozy but its demure and inoffensive nature allows it to be. It may be drowned out if worn during evenings out but otherwise is appropriately a daytime scent and most decidedly bedtime-worthy. Not the scent I expected from a perfume named after a goddess of wild animals and hunt but considering the same deity was also considered a goddess of vegetation, chastity and childbirth, why not. Artemisia is a feminine, graceful fragrance that can do it all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1329183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1329183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1300185" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1300185" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clemmy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251534"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251534.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="clemmy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/ZARKOPERFUME/The-Muse-60665.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60665.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Muse"title="The Muse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1300185ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1300185" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251534">clemmy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-28">02/28/21 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I was a young lady I used to spend lots of time in London. Any Penhaligon shop on my way I had to enter.I bought a small decanter of Artemisia, unfortunately at that time I could not afford a full bottle. I think often to that scent and I miss it. It evokes to me the beautiful clean shopping roads of London in a sunny day and the fragrance is so well balanced that picking notes is almost impossible. Clean, classy, expensive lady. (Now I have this terrible impulse to grab a bottle). 4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1300185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1300185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1292932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1292932" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Malifiscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242642.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Malifiscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fort-Manle/Confessions-of-a-Garden-Gnome-44852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Confessions of a Garden Gnome"title="Confessions of a Garden Gnome"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1292932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1292932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242642">Malifiscent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-15">02/15/21 02:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>White, fluffy, soft, fuzzy, all the clean white adjectives you can think of, that is Artemisia. It is a beautifully done clean scent- just light, airy and fluffy enough, with a little bit of a powdery depth. Besides the apparent blend of musk and violet, it is difficult to pinpoint and break down all the notes in there, rather generating more of an imagery. It smells exactly like a white bar of soap in a luxurious white marbled bathroom. The soap is not drenched in water or creating foam, but at its dry form, placed on a white soap dish carved with gorgeous vintage-styled decorations. It is when you put your nose close to a dry bar of soap, and you are able to smell the clean soapy and muskiness, rounded by what feels almost like a slightly powdery texture.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1292932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1292932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1292452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1292452" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ingeneuxo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1280821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ingeneuxo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Rose-Of-No-Man-s-Land-31931.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31931.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Of No Man's Land"title="Rose Of No Man's Land"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1292452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1292452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280821">ingeneuxo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-14">02/14/21 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>-Inspired by Artemis, Greek goddess of the hunt, the wilderness, wild animals, the Moon, and chastity.<br />
-Artemisia is light, dainty, powdery, and vintage-smelling.<br />
-Brings to mind black-and-white silent films. (or think, Audrey Hepburn, Breakfast at Tiffany's aesthetics.)<br />
-Not fbw. (-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1292452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1292452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1266020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1266020" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherihanei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1272065"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1272065.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherihanei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1266020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1266020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1272065">Cherihanei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-26">12/26/20 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful clean feminine scent ! Nothing synthetic here, elegant flowers, calming powdery bouquet. Penhaligons has never failed me so far, to the point where I - who usually hate white florals and overly feminine scents - found theirs to have a really magnificent story to tell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1266020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1266020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1241427" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1241427" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnEnglishRose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnEnglishRose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Le-Lion-Eau-de-Parfum-61036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"title="Le Lion Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1241427ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1241427" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238427">AnEnglishRose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-26">10/26/20 05:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is like a really beautiful luxurious soap. Like you just had a bath in the Ritz then went downstairs in an elegant dress for afternoon tea.<br />
<br />
Clean, Fresh, Powdery and Feminine. <br />
 <br />
It's elegant and it's also a little bit sexy in a soft and clean way. Delicate violets, tea, vanilla, and musk. <br />
<br />
It's perfectly balanced, the slight sexy sweetness balanced out by the tea, touch of oakmoss, musk and florals. The more I wear it, the more I notice the beauty of it. <br />
<br />
Completely office appropriate, it's gentle and you just get delicate wisps of elegant gorgeousness. <br />
<br />
The dry down is a more sensual skin scent with the tea, very soft vanilla and amber coming through. <br />
<br />
This is a LOVE for me as a clean beautiful daytime scent. This really lifts my spirits.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1241427"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1241427#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1232876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1232876" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frangipanilove"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.528960.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frangipanilove" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Aqua-Vitae-Forte-31404.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31404.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Vitae Forte"title="Aqua Vitae Forte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1232876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1232876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/528960">Frangipanilove</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-05">10/05/20 06:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really not my favourite. Smells too artificial, the synthetic muscs are pushing through too much and covering the floral notes. Big disappointment compared to the description, really wanted to like this. Its a hard pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1232876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1232876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1208910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1208910" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="junnielee07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="junnielee07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1208910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1208910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1239042">junnielee07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-08">08/08/20 05:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is sweet and fresh that is perfect for springtime. However, the dry down is more woody and musky, although you can still smell the fruity sweet floral scent, which made it somehow also suitable for colder days like autumn. For me, it is not a comforting scent but you can definitely feel beautifully feminine with this one. Definitely considering buying a full-size bottle of this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1208910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1208910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1208719" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1208719" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="youngheart"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249782"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249782.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="youngheart" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bottega-Veneta/Bottega-Veneta-12863.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12863.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bottega Veneta"title="Bottega Veneta"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1208719ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1208719" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249782">youngheart</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-07">08/07/20 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I so wanted to like this, but it's not for me. It's very well blended and I wouldn't be able to distinguish any particular notes, except for musk, which is actually very prominent and almost overpowering. It's unusual and unique, but not in a good way. It's too cool and unfriendly, repulsive even. I hear a lot of people say this is a perfume for ice queens and princes, projecting a deference of some sorts. On my skin this is very extreme and it imposes such a distance that I find it offensive and revolting. I suppose from this point of view it's well made and it does the job, but I simply don't want that and don't feel comfortable wearing it. It smells VIP and expensive, but it does so in such an obvious way, that I find it obnoxious.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1208719"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1208719#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1182022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1182022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Austrian_in_Denmark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1100722"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1100722.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Austrian_in_Denmark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Jacobs/Cocktail-Splash-Ginger-11337.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11337.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cocktail Splash Ginger"title="Cocktail Splash Ginger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1182022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1182022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1100722">Austrian_in_Denmark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-30">05/30/20 02:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So romantic. A whiff from a bygone world, when girls from wealthy families stayed mostly indoors and learned to speak French, do needlework, and play the piano. I once knew a woman who had grown up like this before World War II started, completely shielded from (and unprepared for) real life. <br />
<br />
I am happy that many women have the option to go out into the world these days. But it is beautiful to sniff at Artemisia and dream of being a girl in a pretty white dress, sitting in a room where powders and hair brushes are nicely laid out on a vanity, expecting the whole world to be one big, pretty, lovely smelling room. <br />
<br />
Surprisingly I cannot detect the violet in Artemisia - even though it usually is strong on me. I get musk and a juicy nectarine and a sweetness that reminds me of glucose tablets. Very, very delicious. Flowers? A lot, but I cannot tell you, which. Same with wood. Artemisia is so deftly blended, that I cannot analyse it further. <br />
Very longlasting, but with only moderate sillage. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1182022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1182022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1181718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1181718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cadeaux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1237082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cadeaux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1181718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1181718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237082">Cadeaux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-29">05/29/20 08:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So-so. I thought that the initial spray was deep and sweet. I could definitely smell the amber and powder, but somehow there is something quite...plastic about it. Synthetic, musky, medicinal.<br />
<br />
Vibe: Steampunk laboratory, everything moving like clockwork, automated yet magical<br />
The look: You are to meet the engineer today. You're in a beige top with tan trousers. Docs. Your trousers are cuffed.<br />
Form: 100mL tester blind buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1181718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1181718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1167508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1167508" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaChinoiserie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1230146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaChinoiserie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1167508ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1167508" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1230146">LaChinoiserie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-24">04/24/20 16:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An absolutely lovely perfume!<br />
<br />
Proof that reading the notes beforehand doesn't give you the full picture. I normally stay far away from green notes and especially despise green apple. But it's not like that! I mostly get iris and it is powdery, soft, creamy, musky and gorgeous.<br />
<br />
I was doubting between this one and Iris Poudre (Frederic Malle), which is stronger and aldehydic while Artemisia is fresher, more innocent.<br />
<br />
The SA told me she loves layering this with Genetic Bliss (27 87) and I think that's a lovely combination!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1167508"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1167508#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1156634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1156634" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoelleNice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1109066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1109066.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoelleNice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Dia-Woman-1109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dia Woman"title="Dia Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1156634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1156634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1109066">NoelleNice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-19">03/19/20 13:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A favourite of mine among the Penhaligons fragrances. This is a soft, creamy, woody and warm floral musk. It is beautifully blended and smells great from application to dry down. I dont get any hints from the green notes or apple but what I do get is prominent musk, subtle sandalwood, really nice interpretation of violets, light vanilla, and the teeniest breakthrough hint of oak moss (oak moss isnt a note I love, it sometimes assails my nostrils, but here it plays an inoffensive supporting role). I can not individually smell the peach, even though I quite like peachy fragrances. I feel like its there though, adding some juicy sweetness thats just out of reach. While this is suggested as a powdery fragrance, I dont think its overly powdery. Not like some of its counterparts, but there is a subtle powdered cosmetic undertone. Overall a really gorgeous, snuggly and feminine scent - lovely in Autumn (when Im now wearing it in the Southern Hemisphere). It smells great wafting off a light scarf. Love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1156634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1156634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1132205" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1132205" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eve Lee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1221578.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eve Lee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1132205ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1132205" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221578">Eve Lee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-08">01/08/20 05:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume feels like it has every kind of notes combined. Not too fruity, not too green, not too floral but definitely all of those. Well balanced, very soft, delicate skin scent. Somehow its highly complicated and simple at the same time. Its simple but not in a boring way. This reminds me of an elegant, high class, beautiful but not too dazzling woman. Perfect for everyday scent, definitely not an evening scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1132205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1132205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1127552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1087899" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manuscoronum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manuscoronum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1087899ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1087899" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179633">Manuscoronum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-14">08/14/19 21:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The smell of adventure, the smell of death, passion, love and magick. <br />
<br />
I wore this fresh out of the store in Edinburgh and ended up in a cemetary where I watched a man die and gave him CPR until the ambulance came.<br />
<br />
This scent will always reminds me of that!<br />
<br />
This smells like clean air with whipped cream and hints of sandalwood. Artemisia is balanced and beautiful, slightly like sweet spit and sweaty thighs.<br />
<br />
Artemisia is sexy and it removes articles of clothing.<br />
<br />
At first sniff I found Lily of The Valley right away. Major notes of vanilla and aldehydes creates a whipped cream smell.<br />
<br />
Lovely fragrance, a must try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1087899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1087899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1054648" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It gradually develops into a sweet musky vanilla blended with sandalwood.<br />
<br />
I think this scent is rather pleasant and soothing albeit somewhat synthetic, but it's a pity that the projection isn't that great...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Did not like this at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1014731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1014731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1010384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1010384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lalludo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/310963"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.310963.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lalludo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1010384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1010384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/310963">lalludo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-16">12/16/18 03:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>From a sample:<br />
<br />
Opening: strong musk and violet with a slightly synthetic vanilla hint; I cannot detect any green or fruity notes.<br />
Middle: musk<br />
Drydown: powdery musk; I cannot smell any sandalwood or amber, unfortunately.<br />
On me, projection is soft and longevity is weak (2-3 hours).<br />
<br />
This scent is very far from what I like because of the predominat musky note. However, it might be suitable to whoever is looking for a very subtle, intimate and clean fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1010384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1010384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1005054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1005054" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1045903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1045903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1005054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1005054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1045903">Beth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-28">11/28/18 18:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nice. Very girlish and subtle; simple, yet inoffensive and innocent. It has that same snuggly innocent vibe that Noa by Cacharel has, without smelling the same.<br />
<br />
The best way I can describe it is as a cross between fabric softener and a classic makeup powder, but all in the best way possible.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="1005054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=1005054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent992564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1168618">Inlandselkie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-18">10/18/18 12:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is so soft and baby-like to me... its beyond innocent and girlish in a way that brings to mind China dolls and lace gloves rather than pigtails and lollipops. <br />
Theres something creamy in its scent, Im missing any of the green sharpness to complicate it... its a huge departure from my regular perfumes, but its a pleasant and soft scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <br />
1 - Old lady and dog shampoo.<br />
<br />
Never got anything oriental out of this. Nor floral. Mostly just musk with a bit of vanilla and fruit. The opening was interesting, which I'm into but after the first 45 minutes or so, it was boring and vaguely unpleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="949684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=949684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent940700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Thank God it does not. I absolutely hate her fragrances. Plus she seems like a nasty prick in real life as well! <br />
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br />
Anyhoo:<br />
WHAT THIS SMELLS LIKE:<br />
 You're at a high high end salon in NYC or Los Angeles. Beautiful women abound getting their hair and nails done and probably dropping like $300.00 or $400.00 of their rich husbands money on the afternoon of indulgence .<br />
So weirdly, this smells like freshly washed beautiful lady hair being hot blow dried (!) and a chemically nail polish scent (!) all at the same time.<br />
Strangely comforting in a twisted "niche" way.<br />
DO NOT BLIND BUY , that is for sure. LOL.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="898039"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=898039#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent881519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
