It is very calming and surely will bring you sweet vanilla dreams.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="429183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=429183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent414661" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc414661" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="A.M.H.2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/167442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.167442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="A.M.H.2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Robert-Piguet/Fracas-2299.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2299.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fracas"title="Fracas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma414661ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd414661" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/167442">A.M.H.2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-10-09">10/09/13 23:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sorry this review is meant for Amaranthine! <br />
This fragrance is not for everyone. I bought it a year ago, and have been in a confused cycle of love and hate ever since. I finally understood it. This is definitely a floral, a white one. A creamy sweet white bouquet of long standing flowers. To me it smells of very rich and intense white flowers that has been displayed in a vase for a week or so... and then extracted for perfume! Another point worth mentioning is that, on me at least, this perfume only works its magic in warm or sunny climates. On a cold or rainy day it smelled awful and disgusting! I don't know, I'm just sharing my experience. Try it and see for yourself!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="414661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=414661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent397235" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc397235" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pari88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/61674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.61674.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pari88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktoria-Minya/Eau-de-Hongrie-28797.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28797.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Hongrie"title="Eau de Hongrie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma397235ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd397235" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/61674">Pari88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-08-17">08/17/13 18:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfection. Artemisia has absolutely no faults or flaws. If Snow White has a scent, this is surely it.<br />
<br />
 Artemisia is breezy and warm, sweet and comforting, like a 73 degree Spring or Fall day; always flowing in perfect harmony. This is by no means an "innocent" or "naive", it is a Wise Humble Goodness. It is a breathe of fresh air, and a sharp Right turn away from all the fragrances with no faces.<br />
  This radiates a beautiful smell all around you, and leaves memory scent trails where you have stood or sat. It is truly divine. Artemisia is not masked behind powder or musk, vanilla or amber, floral's or citrus.<br />
<br />
Yes, there are similarities with Cashmere Mist, but that is very much clouded by strong musk and powder, while this keeps a perfect balance. I can not put the notes in proper place, but it is creamy, green, sweet and light, but lasting and silage is above par. It shows slight acidity, but stays neutral the whole way through. <br />
Initial spray is sparkly green with acidity, and the middle is more powder sweet, while the drydown is mixed perfectly, sweet light crisp yet a heavy silage.<br />
 <br />
All I can say is this is absolutely Enchanting...I really love it. It makes me very self assured, but also self aware...A true Beauty this is.<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Update: This gets even better with time. Have it on your skin throughout the night and wake up to an enchanting smell. Spray it on a coat and find that a week later a glorious smell is coming from your closet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="397235"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=397235#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent395195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc395195" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EmilyTheStrange"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/523963"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.523963.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EmilyTheStrange" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Si-18453.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18453.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Si"title="Si"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma395195ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd395195" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/523963">EmilyTheStrange</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-08-11">08/11/13 22:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On me, this is violet, jasmine, vanilla and MUSK-MUSK-MUSK. And I love it :)<br />
<br />
This is so very feminine - it has quite a gentle, soft quality about it but it's "there" enough to be noticed. From the notes listed, I thought this may be a bit too simple/safe for me...but I'm pleased to say it's not. I am blessed enough to live in a climate where it's sunny most of the time and I also have a large, beautiful garden out the back...I can easily picture wearing this perfume while sitting in the sun with a good book and a glass of white wine. <br />
<br />
Artemisia is elegant, lady-like, understated and all things CLASS. The longer it's on my skin, the more it envelopes me in such a warm, comforting, loving, FLORAL way. This is just beautiful. Thank you to the amazingly kind and gorgeous member here who sent me this decant - will be buying a big bottle when it runs out </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="395195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=395195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent379755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/515055">wendy nicholls</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-06-23">06/23/13 00:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is a very feminine fragrance, and not to over powering just like new baby skin smells like, just nice. I will bebuying this again for shore it must be tried I think delish..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="379755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=379755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent371861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc371861" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mutmiu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/22963"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.22963.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mutmiu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma371861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd371861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/22963">mutmiu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-05-30">05/30/13 02:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Artemisia and Cashmere Mist have the same main notes - lily of the valley, jasmine, sandalwood, vanilla, musk, and amber -, so it isn't surprising, that they are resembling to each other. Artemisia is softer, creamier, not as dry and synthetic-feeling as Cashmere Mist, but they share almost the same milky-vanillic, musky, cozy drydown. They are perfect comfort scents. <br />
<br />
I think the name Artemisia refers to the ancient Greek virgin moon-goddess Artemis, and not to the actual plant. And indeed there's a lunar aspect of this pure, creamy, somewhat white fragrance.<br />
<br />
Second correction:  if I wear Artemisia rather dabbing than sprinkling, I don't detect the annoying salty-bitter oakmoss note after drydown, just the delicate creamy musk-vanilla-violet fragrance. Artemisia is not a candy sweet girlie-scent, nor a flashy diva-perfume, just completely feminine - a gentle, warm, comforting fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="371861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=371861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent366641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc366641" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BelleBeryl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/4864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.4864.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BelleBeryl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-Berdoues/1902-Orange-Fizz-59854.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59854.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1902 Orange Fizz"title="1902 Orange Fizz"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma366641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd366641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/4864">BelleBeryl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-05-15">05/15/13 03:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Today I am wearing Artemisia I have the 1.5 ml vial sample Eau d'Parfum It is a well rounded blend of powdery florals the middle notes of jasmine tea  lily of the valley vanilla violets apple are very well blended and the base has a hint of oakmoss &amp; amber amongst others. The Penhaligon's website see their info on notes. I like perfumes with oakmoss and amber in the basenotes this is one of them.<br />
This is such a lovely beautiful fragrance I added it to my to buy list for this year. A lovely must have scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="366641"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=366641#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent351561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc351561" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tsth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/9869"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.9869.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tsth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/Gaiac-8293.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8293.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gaiac"title="Gaiac"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma351561ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd351561" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/9869">tsth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-03-31">03/31/13 09:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the epitome of a very feminine "girlie" scent.  It is pink ballet slippers and pastel satin ribbons.  I had to own this scent just because I do not have anything like this.  My scents are so womanly and oriental heavies and I wanted one that was dainty, sweet and so very feminine. I agree w/the poster below who said a "princess" would wear this!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="351561"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=351561#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent347507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc347507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Redpula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/126594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.126594.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Redpula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma347507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd347507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/126594">Redpula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-03-19">03/19/13 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Using a generous two dab from a sample at different areas of my arm, the initial scent on my skin, a light nail polish remover that is a bit strong on alcohol. It is like an Ambroxan or Molecule 01 but is more airy and piercing to my nose. A couple of minutes after, it changes, the piercing alcohol is gone, a very close to skin scent of softness and cleanliness, not much of a powder, but a lesser aggresive musk comes out and a very light baby oil scent that is so good (could be the mix of light  oakmoss and sandalwood) but has to be sniffed deeper to be detected. <br />
<br />
I just can't smell the fruits, florals, sweetness, creaminess and other notes. It is too light, nice but barely there. This is for women who isn't much into perfumes but would love to have something so good of a smell other than lotion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="347507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=347507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent305794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc305794" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonix8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/64825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.64825.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonix8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Omnia-Amethyste-780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Omnia Amethyste"title="Omnia Amethyste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma305794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd305794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/64825">tonix8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-11-21">11/21/12 03:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I didn't care much about this scent, it smells just like Cashmere mist. After a few minutes, however, this settles down into a creamy, milky aroma that just drove me crazy! excellent. just the comforting, cozy smell i've been looking for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="305794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=305794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent295797" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc295797" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eludiastar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/310440"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.310440.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eludiastar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Taylor/Passion-1709.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1709.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Passion"title="Passion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma295797ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd295797" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/310440">eludiastar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-10-20">10/20/12 01:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I fell in love with this perfume within seconds of smelling it in their shop. At first I was resistant to buying it as it's so expensive at 95 but I managed to buy some from their outlet in York for around 40. <br />
As much as I adore this perfume, for the price the sillage is extremely poor. It fades from your skin so quickly, so to get any last you really need to spray it on your clothing. As a result of this I found that I was using excessive amounts each time &amp; my bottle ran out very quickly.<br />
I am very reluctant to buy any more of this perfume, which pains me as it is so beautiful. But thank you so much to the users of this website I will be checking out the recommended alternatives. Donna Karen's perfume seems to be a very reasonable price so fingers crossed I can find it in a department store to sample!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="295797"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=295797#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent293794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc293794" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="myjebo2012"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/309776"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.309776.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="myjebo2012" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ahwaz-Fragrance/Forbidden-Scent-42970.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42970.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Forbidden Scent"title="Forbidden Scent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma293794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd293794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/309776">myjebo2012</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-10-13">10/13/12 19:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought this in Berlin and was shocked after getting to the US that its twin sister is Donna Karen Cashmere Mist.  The touch is just a tad lighter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="293794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=293794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent280710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc280710" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gomt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/131621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.131621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gomt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma280710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd280710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/131621">gomt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-30">08/30/12 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my, how soft this one is! Creamy-powdery, warm and delicate. A subtle blend of musk, vanilla, violet and jasmine. Quite a romantic perfume. <br />
<br />
The powderiness and soapiness reminds me of Salvatore Ferragamo's Signorina. They are different when it comes to notes, of course, but this softness somehow brings them together. Artemisia could be Signorina's older, more mature and elegant - but still very feminine - sister. <br />
<br />
It stays very close to the skin, and not for a long time in my case - about 3 to 4 hours. I wish it would last longer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="280710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=280710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent277545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc277545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="missk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7262"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.7262.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="missk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Parfum-d-Ete-2002-80.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Parfum d'Ete 2002"title="Parfum d'Ete 2002"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma277545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd277545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/7262">missk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-19">08/19/12 05:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon's Artemisia is a fragrance that I can only describe as soft, feminine and clean. I can see why so many women adore this fragrance, as it is full of charm and elegance.<br />
<br />
I hesitate to classify this fragrance as soapy, so I'll stick with clean. The creamy vanilla accord stops it from becoming too predictable, and what a relief it is that this fragrance is more than just 'shower fresh'. It goes to show that clean doesn't always have to be plain and boring.<br />
<br />
Penhaligon's Artemisia is a perfume that I feel extremely comfortable wearing, so I whole-heartedly recommend this fragrance to just about any woman, even those that shy away from anything too loud and obtrusive. As inoffensive as it may appear to be, that's not to say that you won't stand out in a crowd. While testing this fragrance, my boyfriend had many positive things to say about it, so I'd assume that men enjoy its scent.<br />
<br />
I really love Penhaligon's classic approach and style. It is something to be admired, even if it is very British. They have a knack for florals, and compose them so beautifully that they suit almost any occasion. Penhaligon's Artemisia is a scent that you could wear all year round.<br />
<br />
Other than having a dominant blend of crisp white musk and creamy vanilla, Penhaligon's Artemisia also has a soft, powdery violet note and a hint of sweet jasmine and sandalwood in the base. I see that some reviewers are complaining that the longevity is poor, well I'm just adding my two cents, but I found the lasting strength quite impressive, lasting well over six hours on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="277545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=277545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent275653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc275653" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kxnaiades"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/190841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.190841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kxnaiades" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Journey-Woman-25252.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25252.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Journey Woman"title="Journey Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma275653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd275653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/190841">kxnaiades</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-08-12">08/12/12 20:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It took me a while to write this review as I'm neither enchanted by this nor put off by it. I'm more nonchalant. From this lovely named bottle, I get a woody muskiness, no violets but a light whisp of white flowers and bergamot. It's well-composed, the notes that could have been jarring in other compositions, sit well together in this. It would have gotten a better mark from me if it lasted longer than the 2 plus hours I got from it. Perhaps it's just me, I hope others get to enjoy this far longer than I did, despite copious amounts sprayed all over skin and clothes. It's a dignified, class act. I just wish it lasted more than one scene.<br />
I have a full bottle from 2 years ago that's sitting quietly with my other scents, I usually carry it with me on travels as it's an easy shape and size to pack, the outer box is quite sturdy and I've never had an issue with either breaks or spills with Penhaligon's on travels. Just a useful titbit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="275653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=275653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent261313" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc261313" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zephyrae13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/169273"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.169273.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zephyrae13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma261313ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd261313" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/169273">Zephyrae13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-06-20">06/20/12 11:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Am I the only one wondering where the Artemesia aroma I love so well is?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Its like wearing a soft cashmere cardigan and a pretty silk dress.  It is very personal to me, i dont need anyone else to smell it on me, as it provides me comfort and feels truly "me".  Its vanilla, mossy, amber, tea &amp; white floral.  Yes like cashmere mist but a bit more interesting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="232692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=232692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent203506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc186196" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fragoleconcrema"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/27443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.27443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fragoleconcrema" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma186196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd186196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/27443">fragoleconcrema</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-10-01">10/01/11 15:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My parents bought me a small flacon of Artemisia during a recent trip to London. <br />
<br />
Surprisingly this took quite a lot of trying out to get used to. Top notes are very vanilla-ish to - though I detect some of the fruity notes. But nevertheless, Artemisia is a special perfume all right. The dry down is exquisite, and another plus is that, on my skin, it's rather long-lasting actually.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="186196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=186196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent182840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc182840" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tklicavoli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/111825"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tklicavoli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-Brit-Eau-de-Toilette-28522.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28522.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry Brit Eau de Toilette"title="Burberry Brit Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma182840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd182840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/111825">tklicavoli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-09-19">09/19/11 20:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's soft, feminine, and terribly sexy without being overt. It opens with an earthy tang of nectarine and green apple but it isn't fruity at all. It's more of fruit skin scent. It's not juicy, it's milky. Candied violet and creamy vanilla meet in the middle like old friends who dare to be lovers. It's a quiet romance that doesn't need to shout or be sugary sweet to be delicious. I find this refreshing in a world of over the top, gourmand, dessert like celebrity perfumes. There's also a slightly wet dark green element thanks to oak moss. Lastly, the dry down is a perfect powdery tonka bean dream. Artemesia is intoxicating and memorable. I feel like myself when I wear it. <br />
<br />
Women who enjoy Guerlain and Dior fragrances will love this. Artemesia could easily be the older, more sophisticated sister of that tart, Miss Dior Cherie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="182840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=182840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent171687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc171687" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lara0905"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47571"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.47571.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lara0905" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baruti/Perverso-54651.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54651.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perverso"title="Perverso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma171687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd171687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47571">lara0905</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-08-09">08/09/11 08:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Somehow this scent is very reminds me of Laura Biagiotti's Laura infusion with Bijan Nude but the creamy-milky-oily way.<br />
The top notes fades away very fast, leaves the creamy-bit oily- sweet vanilla shakesmell with some sandalwood-close to skin-drydown.I feel the sultry feminity in this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="171687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=171687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent162539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc162539" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="paradisolucky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.39237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="paradisolucky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Back-to-Pink-4215.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4215.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Back to Pink"title="Back to Pink"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma162539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd162539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39237">paradisolucky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-07-05">07/05/11 18:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance. It reminds of going to the countryside fair and sampling the candied violets. Very fresh lightly coated with a powdered sugar. It has a slightly creamy taste to it with a sweet and fresh and almost citrus tang to it. How I loved to walk around looking at all the booths with different homemade trinkets, quilts, and foods to sell while I wandered aimlessly and blissfully with a sweet and creamy fresh floral taste on my tongue and filling my nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="162539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=162539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent148166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc148166" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="9154mf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="9154mf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stila/Creme-Bouquet-9413.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9413.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Creme Bouquet"title="Creme Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma148166ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd148166" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8522">9154mf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-05-17">05/17/11 05:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft feminine creamy and milky is how I describe this. It has an elegant understated feel and is not perfumey at all. Wear this if you want to smell fresh and clean without being citrusy. Silage and staying power not great but I love it anyway. Top notes lasted about 10 seconds, powdery violet and soft vanilla come out almost immediately.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="148166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=148166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent144220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't wear it every day but when I want to smell elegant. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719">tessture</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-01-13">01/13/11 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh fruit and flowers softened by avelvety vanilla/oakmoss/musk base. There's  an almost milky sense here, smooth and cool, but it dries down to a very basic soft musk on me, and loses all the nuance. Still, the dry down is also nice, if inoffensive. I won't be buying  a full bottle, but I did like experiencing the sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="121197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=121197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent108048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/27358">Cereza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-10-28">10/28/10 01:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my, it opened so lovely with burst of bubble gum sweetness from the peach&amp;apple. I feel amazing violet with hints of tea and a tiny bit of jasmin, but for me the violet is dominant and, oh, boy I do love violet. <br />
I feel L-O-V as well, which I'm usually not so happy about, because of it's power to enduce headache, but here it's very gentle, well blended with creamy and comforting vanilla+violet.<br />
<br />
I find this to be a comfort scent, very beautiful and very cozy. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="108048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=108048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent106308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17386">romanticflower</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-10-18">10/18/10 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Artemisia is a wonderful blend of creamy almond and soft oakmoss.i do really love wear it when i wanna feel wraped by a sensual fragrance.i perceive is lovely and delicate synphony of clean and pure notes, nectarine plays with lilly, jasmine and violets in the meanwhile shy vanilla shares the sheet music with moss, amber and sandalwood creating a sophisticated composition.perfect both for girls and woman very atractive parfume for fall and winter</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="106308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=106308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent104340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc104340" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="melia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="melia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Miss-Charming-1714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Charming"title="Miss Charming"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma104340ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd104340" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24532">melia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-10-06">10/06/10 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On my skin, this is rather creamy than powdery. Don't get very much fruits. Vanilla and far away some moss and green notes. A rather comfortable smell though, kind of a skin scent too. Not very 'loud'. Reminds me of those winter days when your mind seems not be on earth at all, but constant somewhere in the clouds. At that point, it's the best to stay at home on the coutch watching movies, accompanied by Artemisia.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="104340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=104340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent88930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc88930" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sherapop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.17027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sherapop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-L-Eau-38543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"title="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma88930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd88930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027">sherapop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2010-07-08">07/08/10 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon ARTEMISIA is a lovely oriental floral, to be a bit more precise: lightly vanilla-dusted violet. The dominant violet comes through from the very beginning and persists through the drydown, which is a slightly sweet floral woody scent with a touch of vanilla. In fact, the development is so quick as to make this virtually a linear fragrance.<br />
<br />
ARTEMISIA has good staying power and medium sillage, with a clean powdery aspect. I very much enjoyed wearing this fragrance on a relatively sunny summer day, so although I might have thought it better suited for cold weather, in fact, it has turned out to be an all-season beauty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4547"comment_id="88930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html?ccid=88930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent84556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
